title: PBE Launcher not downloading
body: When i'm downloading the PBE launcher it gets to about 70% and just shuts itself down, My normal league of legends launcher works perfectly fine.     I really want to try the PBE but it just doesnt want to work for me, I have enabled the PBE launcher on my firewall and i have no security blocking the download so i'm really confused at this point. Please help me :/

replies.body:
Since the PBE servers reside in a different geolocation than the EUW servers you also access, this is likely caused by your route to the PBE servers. I recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are aligned with what we recommend.

Let me know if you continue to have issues patching on the PBE after working through those steps.
